text:
Dear Alice,

 

Where do we need to pay the amount, can you please send me the invoices and the bank account information to were we need to pay them.

 

Also, do you have any information for the BCR bank account, do they need additional documents, because we do not have access to the bank account.

 

Best regards,

 

Nikolay

 

From: Alice I <alice.i@almaj.eu> 
Sent: Monday, January 29, 2024 3:14 PM
To: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com>
Cc: Cosmin T <cosmin.t@almaj.eu>
Subject: Fwd: Unpaid invoices 2023 

 

Fyi

 

Trimis de pe Outlook pentru iOS <https://aka.ms/o0ukef> 

________________________________

De la: Facturi BRM <facturi@brm.ro <mailto:facturi@brm.ro> >

Către: Alice I <alice.i@almaj.eu <mailto:alice.i@almaj.eu> >; Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com>  <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >; Trade@tibiel.com <mailto:Trade@tibiel.com>  <Trade@tibiel.com <mailto:Trade@tibiel.com> >
Cc: Piata centralizata a Gazelor Naturale BRM <gaze@brm.ro <mailto:gaze@brm.ro> >
Subiect: Unpaid invoices 2023
